title: Nightclubs warn Covid passports will have 'devastating' impact
content:
1. Nightclubs warn Covid passports will have 'devastating' impact  BBC News
  2. UK Tightens Covid Restrictions to Curb Omicron's Spread; Issues WFH Guidance  Bloomberg
  3. Britain Introduces 'Plan B' Covid Measures to Tackle Omicron  The New York Times
  4. PM introduces Covid rules whilst under fire for lockdown Christmas party - BBC Newsnight  BBC News
  5. Boris Johnson rushes in Covid plan B amid Christmas party scandal  The Guardian

localize.title: ナイトクラブがCovidパスポートに「壊滅的な」影響を与えると警告
夜总会警告说，科维德护照将产生 "破坏性 "影响
夜總會警告說，科維德護照將產生 "破壞性 "影響
